solution_line_template: The cost of the loaves of bread is {num_loaves_bread} * ${cost_per_loaf} = $<<{num_loaves_bread}*{cost_per_loaf}={cost_bread}>>{cost_bread}.
The cost of the milk is {num_cartons_milk} * ${cost_per_milk_carton} = $<<{num_cartons_milk}*{cost_per_milk_carton}={cost_milk}>>{cost_milk}.
The total cost of the groceries is ${cost_bread} + ${cost_milk} = $<<{cost_bread}+{cost_milk}={total_groceries_cost}>>{total_groceries_cost}.
